channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 5 green walk, 3rd January
item.description:
Hi, Since I’ve moved here the road has seemed to have sunked more and more near my drop kerb. This has made the drop kerb not obvious and people parking in front of my drive
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Walk, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinister Graffiti - Slade Children's Playground Park Plumstead London SE18, 3rd January
item.description:
Please see attached photo,as usual there is strange graffiti on the wall inside and at the back of the Slades children play park in plumstead, please would you arrange a removal or better still paint over the graffiti (a dark colour perhaps green) to change the colour of the white wall in order to attempt to prevent graffiti reoccurring

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Plumstead Common Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped in green verge - Wyldfield Gardens, 3rd January
item.description:
Rubbish is persistently dumped into the green verge as well as besides this area. Can signage please be placed advising that dumping litter is an offence. Thank you in advance. Michelle

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2a, Latymer Road, Edmonton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox, 3rd January
item.description:
I have woken up to find a dead fox in my garden by my back door. Im a single parent to 3 young children so im worried about their health if it isnt removed. i cannot afford to pay for this to be removed and im the only adult in my house. please advise
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Hill, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 124 prince of wales rd, on road beyond kerb of bike lane, 3rd January
item.description:
This manhole makes a very loud noise every time vehichle passes, which happens 24 hours a day. it is 5 yards from people sleeping. please report for fixing asap. has been like this for weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 126, Prince of Wales Road, Chalk Farm, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
